mapper.insert: insert into andji_system_param_base (PARAM_ID, SYSTEM_NAME, MODULE_NAME, PARAM_INDEX, PARAM_NAME, PARAM_VALUE, PARAM_REMARK) values (#{paramId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update andji_system_param_base set SYSTEM_NAME = #{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODULE_NAME = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM_INDEX = #{paramIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM_NAME = #{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM_VALUE = #{paramValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM_REMARK = #{paramRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PARAM_ID = #{paramId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select PARAM_ID, SYSTEM_NAME, MODULE_NAME, PARAM_INDEX, PARAM_NAME, PARAM_VALUE, PARAM_REMARK from andji_system_param_base where PARAM_ID = #{paramId,jdbcType=CHAR}
select PARAM_ID, SYSTEM_NAME, MODULE_NAME, PARAM_INDEX, PARAM_NAME, PARAM_VALUE, PARAM_REMARK from andji_system_param_base
